atk-s0510a24:3_0: 5-6. Dutiyāpadāne vijahitvā devavaṇṇanti devatā sarīraṁ vijahitvā chaḍḍetvā, manussasarīraṁ
atk-s0510a24:3_1: nimminitvāti attho. Adhikāraṁ kattukāmoti adhikakiriyaṁ puññasambhāraṁ kattukāmo
atk-s0510a24:3_2: devaro nāma ahaṁ devarājā bhariyāya saha buddhaseṭṭhassa sāsane sādaratāya idha imasmiṁ
atk-s0510a24:3_3: manussaloke āgamiṁ āgatoti attho. Tassa bhikkhā mayā dinnāti padumuttarassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a24:3_4: yo nāmena devalo nāma sāvako ahosi, tassa sāvakassa mayā vippasannena cetasā bhikkhā
atk-s0510a24:4_0: 9-10. Tatiyāpadāne ānando nāma sambuddhoti ānandaṁ tuṭṭhiṁ jananato ānando nāma paccekabuddhoti
atk-s0510a24:4_1: attho. Amanussamhi kānaneti amanussapariggahe kānane mahāaraññe parinibbāyi anupādisesanibbānadhātuyā
atk-s0510a24:4_2: antaradhāyi, adassanaṁ agamāsīti attho. Sarīraṁ tattha jhāpesinti ahaṁ devalokā idhāgantvā
atk-s0510a24:4_3: tassa bhagavato sarīraṁ tattha araññe jhāpesiṁ dahanaṁ akāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a24:6_0: 20. Chaṭṭhāpadāne ahosiṁ candano nāmāti nāmena paṇṇattivasena candano nāma. Sambuddhassatrajoti
atk-s0510a24:6_1: paccekasambuddhabhūtato pubbe tassa atrajo putto ahaṁ. Ekopāhano mayā dinnoti ekaṁ
atk-s0510a24:6_2: upāhanayugaṁ mayā dinnaṁ. Bodhiṁ sampajja me tuvanti tena upāhanayugena me mayhaṁ
atk-s0510a24:7_0: 23-24. Sattamāpadāne mañjarikaṁ karitvānāti mañjeṭṭhipupphaṁ haritacaṅkoṭakaṁ gahetvā
atk-s0510a24:7_1: rathiyaṁ vīthiyā paṭipajjiṁ ahaṁ tathā paṭipannova bhikkhusaṅghapurakkhataṁ bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0510a24:7_2: parivutaṁ samaṇānaggaṁ samaṇānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ aggaṁ seṭṭhaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ addasanti
atk-s0510a24:7_3: sambandho. Buddhassa abhiropayinti disvā ca pana taṁ pupphaṁ ubhohi hatthehi paggayha
atk-s0510a24:7_4: ukkhipitvā buddhassa phussassa bhagavato abhiropayiṁ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a24:8_1: loṇavirahitāni paṇṇāni pacitvā bhakkhāmi, aloṇapaṇṇabhakkho amhi bhavāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a24:8_2: Niyamesu ca saṁvutoti niyamasaññitesu pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādīsu niccapañcasīlesu saṁvuto
atk-s0510a24:8_3: pihitoti attho. Pātarāse anuppatteti purebhattakāle anuppatte. Siddhattho upagacchi
atk-s0510a24:8_4: manti mama samīpaṁ siddhattho bhagavā upagañchi sampāpuṇi. Tāhaṁ buddhassa pādāsinti
atk-s0510a24:8_5: ahaṁ taṁ aloṇapaṇṇaṁ tassa buddhassa adāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a24:10_0: 37-38. Dasamāpadāne sikhinaṁ sikhinaṁ yathāti sarīrato nikkhantachabbaṇṇaraṁsīhi
atk-s0510a24:10_1: obhāsayantaṁ jalantaṁ sikhīnaṁ sikhībhagavantaṁ sikhīnaṁ yathā jalamānaaggikkhandhaṁ
atk-s0510a24:10_2: viya. Aggajaṁ pupphamādāyāti aggajanāmakaṁ pupphaṁ gahetvā buddhassa sikhissa bhagavato
